About Me

Hi I'm Stefan, I'm 20 and I'm living in Lille in the North of France

More about me

Since I was in middle school, IT has been a hobby of mine. I knew then that it was a passion i want to pursue.
Currently, my main focus is in web development and all around front-end. I do dabble with hardware from time to time.
I have a positive outlook in life, taking each experience whether good or bad, as a stepping stone for success.

Internship at HB-Digit & Efficom

August 2019 - August 2020

I'm actually in internship at HB-Digit which is a Drupal web services firm, and I'm at Efficom school.
My main abilities are :

  • Developing web services (Drupal8, php, bootstrap, twig, JS, jQuery...)
  • Customer relationship management with agile method (Jira)
  • Etablishing and respect of technical specifications

Traineeship web developer at Mumatic

January 2018 - February 2018

There I worked on differents tasks related to development.

  • Developing my first static website for a pharmacy
  • Install a telephon IP server using Linux and GoAutoDial
  • Having a look at MongoDB Database

Volontariat Calgary Immigrant Educational Society

January 2019 - February 2019

I went to Canada for 2months in Calgary (AB) to find back my girlfriend but it was also a way to discover myself
Having a good level already in English, I could've tested myself by teaching kids who were barely speaking english.
That's also during this time that I developed this website.

Traineeship at Auchan's head office

May 2017 - June 2017

For my first traineeship I had to maintain the network to make sure everything is going for the 100th employees.
I was also in charge to take care of their IT needs such as fixing the issues they were facing with their computer, phone, preparing new work environment.
